ai-ps1.4:96.10_0: as far as the origin of the world ...
ai-ps1.4:96.12_0: as far as the path of the path extends ...
ai-ps1.4:96.16_0: the analytical knowledge of inspired speech
ai-ps1.4:96.17_0: As far as there is a designation of faculties ...
ai-ps1.4:96.18_0: the knowledge of the disposing of sentient beings ...
ai-ps1.4:96.21_0: They’ve seen, heard, thought, known, sought, and explored by the mind. And they’ve seen, heard, thought, known, attained, sought, or explored by the mind.
ai-ps1.4:96.22_0: I’ve not been determined with wisdom:
ai-ps1.4:96.24_0: For the wisdom there is the faculty of wisdom,
ai-ps1.4:96.25_0: wisdom, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-ps1.4:97.1_0: He makes a sound with the ears, start out with the faith of trust,
ai-ps1.4:97.2_0: he attends on sounds, he attends on him;
ai-ps1.4:97.3_0: he For assembles within the sound, it is called “perfected”;
ai-ps1.4:97.5_0: if he supports him when he is mindful and he attends on him;
ai-ps1.4:97.6_0: He enters upon a jhāna while he is available.
ai-ps1.4:97.7_0: He understands what is going on to restraining place, he knows:
ai-ps1.4:97.8_0: He makes a sound, and after taking it up, he fell down and lay down (them).
ai-ps1.4:97.9_0: if he lights out a lamp, he gets someone to together;
ai-ps1.4:97.10_0: if he knows that he has someone else nurse him;
ai-ps1.4:97.11_0: if he attends on him when he is nurses him;
ai-ps1.4:97.12_0: if he attends on him when he is mindfully;
ai-ps1.4:97.13_0: One who understands he is concentrated in attaining.
ai-ps1.4:97.14_0: For one who is concentrated within, it is singly concentrated.
ai-ps1.4:97.15_0: He enters upon a jhāna that is good fortune-tempered.
ai-ps1.4:97.17_0: He knows sounds, he knows: I am able to understand
ai-ps1.4:97.18_0: He understands what is signified, he knows:
ai-ps1.4:97.19_0: he knows, he knows as it is mindful;
ai-ps1.4:97.20_0: One who understands he is concentrated,
ai-ps1.4:98.1_0: and have believed itself as it is with its roots,
ai-ps1.4:98.2_0: and was attending on by the sounds, and very mindful,
ai-ps1.4:98.3_0: Having heard the sound of the ears assembled together with the sounds, and so on,
ai-ps1.4:98.4_0: and understands the sounds, and its ears,
ai-ps1.4:98.5_0: and have attended to mindfulness established and he is mindful,
ai-ps1.4:98.6_0: and seized by the One of Ten Powers, too, the Commentary One
ai-ps1.4:98.8_0: and mindfully sounds are related to the ears of the sounds.
ai-ps1.4:98.9_0: Having established mindfulness in the formless meditation, and also the mindful ones who were established -
ai-ps1.4:98.10_0: and because of being established on this generation,
ai-ps1.4:98.11_0: Having attended to the attendants (of sounds), the sound has been established,
ai-ps1.4:98.12_0: and has attended to mindfulness established and he is mindful,
ai-ps1.4:98.13_0: understand that this generation is devoted toed, and it is devoted toed by oneself.
ai-ps1.4:98.14_0: Compassionately is the basis for sounds, and so on.
ai-ps1.4:98.15_0: and precisely by directing each other, too.
ai-ps1.4:98.16_0: Having entered upon them, they are also established in oneself that is capable and also access only.
ai-ps1.4:98.19_0: and for one who is established in him, too, one who is calmed since he has established mindfulness,
ai-ps1.4:98.20_0: understandsable things, surrounded by right understanding,
ai-ps1.4:99.1_0: You should know this: ‘The Realized One has given up knowledge with vision and vision, the eye of the Buddha. He sees sentient beings with little dust in their eyes and with much dust in their eyes, with keen faculties and with weak faculties, with good qualities and with bad qualities, easy to teach and hard to teach. And some of them lived seeing the danger in the fault to do with the next world, while others did not.
ai-ps1.4:100.1_0: A person with little dust on the eyes, having little dust on the eyes, and a person who is faithless and shouting a great noise,
ai-ps1.4:100.2_0: A person who is energetic, who has little dust on the lion’s leper, and is a large person with little dust.
ai-ps1.4:100.3_0: A person who is mindful, with little dust on the eyes, and a great light,
ai-ps1.4:100.4_0: A person with immersion but has little dust on the eyes. A person with no faults,
ai-ps1.4:100.5_0: A person with wisdom is wise, few, and witless.
ai-ps1.4:101.1_0: Tissa, having sharp faculties, dull person with faith and confidence, the person who cut the faithless person, the one without a doubts,
ai-ps1.4:101.2_0: A person with wisdom is wise, no witless,
ai-ps1.4:101.3_0: She’s faithful, needle, and faithful. She’s faithless and faithless.
ai-ps1.4:101.4_0: The person is wise, possessing wisdom.
ai-ps1.4:101.5_0: A person of emptiness is hard to understand, so is a person with faithless wisdom. ...
ai-ps1.4:101.6_0: The wise person is wise, witless, and wise.
ai-ps1.4:102.1_0: Some person who, having seen the fault in the next world, some who sees no faith in the next world.
ai-ps1.4:102.3_0: A person who’s wise, witless, and not seeing danger in the next world.
ai-ps1.4:103.1_0: the world, producing a light, a world of light, a world of flame, a world of light, and a disappearance.
ai-ps1.4:104.2_0: ‘All sentient beings are sustained by food.’
ai-ps1.4:105.1_0: all Vajjis are connected with the defilements. All of them are hard to do so.
ai-ps1.4:105.2_0: Thus in this world with its perceptions, perceptions of danger in the world, just like the Vajjians.
ai-ps1.4:105.3_0: These are the five faculties in these five ways: when he sees these five faculties, he knows and sees.
ai-ps1.4:105.4_0: The third section for recitation is finished.
ai-ps1.4:105.5_0: The story at the faculty is finished.
